name: Scripting Diplomacy: An Autistic Scripting Simulator
name_original: Scripting Diplomacy: An Autistic Scripting Simulator
description:
I live, therefore I script. 
An autistic diplomat has their first solo mission on a non-human space station.

This is a short text-based Twine game with looping playthrough, which can be finished in 15-20 minutes. Plain text, with minimal frills. When all endings have been explored, the game will finish.

Note: this game will work best on desktop, laptop, or tablet. Text will not scroll on a mobile browser.

This game was originally published in sub-Q magazine (under my previous name, which we'll not mention here). I haven't modified this game from its original publication.

This game is based on my own scripting experiences as an autistic person; this is only from my own experience and not meant to represent autistic people as a whole!
